mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_member (pname, pwd, realname, phone, pos, pcode, headpic, state, created, updated) values (#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_member set pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pos = #{pos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcode = #{pcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headpic = #{headpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, pname, pwd, realname, phone, pos, pcode, headpic, state, created, updated from tb_member
SELECT * from tb_member where pname = #{pname, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pwd = #{pwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT count(*) from tb_member where state = 1
AND pname LIKE concat('%', #{pname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
